hiveArticle.title: When You Are Standing Above the Clouds
hiveArticle.body:
So I was in KodaiKanal and where it was raining, the fog was so much that it looks like you are standing above the clouds.

![_DSC0213.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmZN3hMG5hXTjPGqfNpg92oNpaTqJTk2HACPW6Py6QE7Nw/_DSC0213.jpg)

### Nokia 6 : Manual Mode
